20101204073859.333|20101204073901.000|CCO|OKAY.

20101204073913.500|20101204073916.000|CCO|CHICAGO TO ST. LOUIS.
20101204073916.000|20101204073918.500|CCO|IT COST JUST $154.
20101204073918.500|20101204073921.000|CCO|BUT MY FOUR BAGS WERE $260.
20101204073921.000|20101204073923.000|CCO|I SPENT $14 FOR EXTRA LEG ROOM.
20101204073923.000|20101204073925.000|CCO|$39 FOR SOMETHING CALLED THE 
20101204073925.000|20101204073927.000|CCO|PREMIERE SECURITY LINE.
20101204073927.000|20101204073929.000|CCO|ADD THAT $25 FEE FOR THE 
20101204073929.000|20101204073931.000|CCO|FRUSTRATING PHONE CALL AND I 
20101204073931.000|20101204073933.500|CCO|PAID $338 IN FEES, THAT'S MORE 
20101204073933.500|20101204073936.000|CCO|THAN TWICE WHAT MY TICKET COST.
20101204073936.000|20101204073938.500|CCO|>> THEY PUT A CREDIT CARD READER

20101204074049.333|20101204074051.000|CCO|FRUSTRATED FLYER, STEVEN SLATER.

20101204074205.286|20101204074206.714|CCO|>> WELL, THERE IS ONE SEAT 
20101204074206.714|20101204074208.143|CCO|WORSE.

20101204074232.429|20101204074233.857|CCO|>> Reporter: ONE MORE PIECE OF
